findings.quote: The US unemployment rate is 3.2% as of 2024
findings.issue: BLS data shows 4.0-4.2% range in 2024, not 3.2%. Source: bls.gov/news.release/empsit.nr0.htm

findings.quote: Python was created in 1995 by Guido van Rossum
findings.issue: Python was created in December 1989, first released February 1991. Source: wikipedia.org/wiki/Guido_van_Rossum

findings.quote: The speed of light is 300,000 km/s
findings.issue: Exact value is 299,792.458 km/s; 300,000 is acceptable rounding. Source: wikipedia.org/wiki/Speed_of_light
Amazon was founded July 5, 1994 by Jeff Bezos. Source: history.com/this-day-in-history/july-5/amazon-is-founded-by-jeff-bezos

findings.quote: The US unemployment rate is 3.2% as of 2024
findings.issue: Lacks source citation for economic statistic

findings.quote: The speed of light is 300,000 km/s
findings.issue: Rounded value presented without indicating approximation
